repositories.author: piwik
repositories.name: piwik
repositories.description: Liberating Web Analytics. Star us on Github? +1. Piwik is the leading open alternative to Google Analytics that gives you full control over your data. Piwik lets you easily collect data from websites, apps & the IoT and visualise this data and extract insights. Privacy is built-in. We love Pull Requests!
